Hero.title: Hello there! I`m Vova, a Front-End Developer based in Ukraine.

card1.title: The Wild Oasis (Client Version)
card1.desc: The Wild Oasis is the client-side version of a hotel management application. Users can register, search for available rooms, and make reservations for their preferred dates.

card2.title: The Wild Oasis (Internal Management Version)
card2.desc: The Wild Oasis is an internal hotel management application where users can register, view hotel statistics, add rooms, check room status, and switch themes.

card3.title: Frontend Engineer Intern
card3.desc: Assisted in the development of a web-based platform using React.js, enhancing interactivity.

card2.title: Mobile App Dev - JSM Tech

card1.title: Planning & Strategy
card1.desc: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.

card2.title: Development & Progress Update
card2.desc: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.

card3.title: Development & Launch
card3.desc: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved design, I'll translate everything into functional code, building your website from the ground up.
